ComicInfo.Penciller: Steven Butler,George Pérez,Steve Butler,George Pérez,Steve Butler
ComicInfo.Summary: Finding Pixx dead, Ultraforce makes an all out final assault against Atalon, venting their grief against the mad despot. Contrary is able to retrieve her airship from underwater while everything occurred on Atalon's island and uses it to handle Atalon's forces. As a final act, Atalon uses his unbelivable power over gravity to set in motion the destruction of the planet. Before he can accomplish his goal, Atalon is teleported onto Contrary's ship, where she speaks to him to decide a better fate for everyone. Their discussion causes Atalon to stop his chain of destruction and he comes to an accordance with Contrary and then the leaders of various countries. Using the island he created as a base, Atalon becomes the King of his island, living on the surface as a nation.
ComicInfo.Title: Final Blow
